message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to pay $10,500. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility. I can do $11,800, but I have to say that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'd love to hear your thoughts.
